xwikidoc.title: Invitation to join group $groupTitle on Sankore
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity filter="none"}} {{html clean="false" wiki="true"}} #** * Message invitation to join group * * @type mailtemplate * @translate this page requires full translation * @refactored ludovic *# #if($invitation) #set($invitee = $xwiki.getURLEncoded($invitation.invitee)) #set($inviter = $xwiki.getUserName($invitation.inviter, false)) #set($message = $invitation.text.trim()) #set($code = $invitation.key) #set($qs = "code=${code}&user=${invitee}") #set($acceptLink=$xwiki.getDocument("${spaceName}.JoinGroup").getExternalURL("view",$qs)) #end
<p/> $inviter has invited you to join a group - $groupTitle - on Sankore. <p/> This is a description of the group: <p/> $groupDescription
You can learn more about $groupTitle at: <p/> $group.homeURL
The following personalized message has been provided by $inviter: <p/> $!message
You must be a registered member of sankore.org and logged into the site in order to join group $groupTitle. <p/> To accept this invitation, click on the following link: <p/> $acceptLink
Sincerely, <p/> Sankore, for $groupName {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
